name: Christmas Supermarket Store
description:
The Christmas is getting near and the kids are all excited to celebrate this festival to the fullest with their family. Usually kids loves to do shopping at the grocery store for Christmas festival. But for a change on this Christmas do you want to jump the other side & play as a grocery cashier in your very own supermarket & learn how to operate the cash register? Christmas Supermarket Store is a fast paced time management game to test your time management skills all in a speedy way. Christmas Supermarket Store is an educational cashier game for young boys & girls. In Christmas Supermarket Store kids can learn how to handle money as grocery store cashier mania to become the best supermarket manager in town. Kids can improve their basic math learning skills like addition & subtraction. A supermarket manager knows how to operate the grocery cash register, serving the customers on time, so they don’t get mad on any kind of delays to get their Christmas grocery mania.

Christmas Supermarket Store starts with a manual cash register with receipt and scanner you have to enter the price of each grocery item and get the total of all. Tap on the customer to receive money. Cashier drawer will open and you can put the received money and return the balance amount to the customer. You can upgrade your manual cash register, with the automated one so you can scan each grocery list the customer brings to the counter, and ring up the price! Then accept payment via cash, credit card or through mobile NFC, and enter the total amount, followed by scanning the credit card or mobile! In this time management fun filled cash register game you can also improve your store management skills. Customers are in queue, waiting to pay money and get their Christmas grocery items packed on time. A fast-paced store management game to test your speed and accuracy. Christmas Supermarket Grocery Store is an educational and fun game where children learn to handle money at shopping mall. It can help improve their math and calculation skills.

Christmas Supermarket Store Features:
* Fast paced supermarket Time Management Cash Register Simulation.
* Serve customers & make them happy to get rewards.
* Modern payment methods; Credit Card Machine and NFC Mobile payments.
* Unlock Point Of Sale Machine to scan grocery.
* A fun filled supermarket cash register games.
* Use Auto Complete Robot to get task done automatically.
* Use Cool Candies to increase patience of customers.
* Multiple Machines and Purchasing Items.
* Cater your Clients with multifunctional machines.
